summary: This document contains due diligence research results for NES, LLC, including searches for negative media, court cases, and other compliance-related checks. It highlights the absence of significant negative findings and provides details on a court case involving NES, LLC. The document is marked confidential and is intended for internal use only.

events.title: Court Case Filed
events.description: National Evaluation Systems, Inc filed a lawsuit against NES, LLC for trademark infringement.

keyFacts: The document is a due diligence report for NES, LLC, dated August 17, 2018.
No significant negative media or alerts were found for NES, LLC.
The court case National Evaluation Systems, Inc v. Nes, LLC was filed on April 5, 2005, for trademark infringement.
Michael A Ponsor was the judge presiding over the case.
Nicole Shaw is identified as the CEO of NES, LLC.
